title: Seeking MOBA players for survey

embed.description: Qualtrics sophisticated online survey software solutions make creating online surveys easy. Learn more about Research Suite and get a free account today.

body:
Hi All,

I'm a Masters student completing my thesis and I'm recruiting participants to complete my online survey.

The study is exploring the factors associated with wellbeing in multiplayer online battle arena game (MOBA) players. The purpose of this study is to explore the positive and negative wellbeing outcomes of playing, and to investigate the relationship between gaming and mental wellbeing.

The survey takes 15-20 minutes to complete.

Your help is really appreciated!

replies.body: Interesting survey. As I filled it out I noticed that your question regarding competitive or casual play only had options titled Yes and No, and they sounded weird in context of the question. You might want to check it to avoid confusion :P
